text: Doug Green (1954/1955 â€“ September 1, 2021) was an American Republican politician. He was a member of the Ohio House of Representatives for the 66th district from 2013 until 2020. Green was born in Brown County, Ohio. Green died at the age of 66 from COVID-19 on September 1, 2021 in Mt. Orab, Ohio. ==References== Category:1950s births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Ohio Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Ohio
title: Doug Green (Ohio politician)
